metadata.title: RZ/N2L: What is the maximum communication speed when the serial host interface is used?

sections.content:
Question:
What is the maximum communication speed when the serial host interface is used?
Answer:
The maximum clock frequency is 40 MHz. The data width can be selected from 1, 4, and 8 bits. DDR operation is not supported.
Suitable Products
RZ/N2L
